articles.title: Asteroid 2023 JL hurtling towards Earth for very close approach; Know details - HT Tech
articles.description: An asteroid is on its way towards Earth, travelling at a fearsome speed and it could make its closest approach to the planet today. Check out its speed, distance and other details, as revealed by NASA.
